Game.Name: Man Overboard! (Europe)
Game.plot: You've really been dropped in the deep end this time. The Steam Ship is on a oneway trip to the seabed after a collision with an iceberg. It's jam packed with panic stricken passengers waiting for their hero, Kevin, to come to the rescue. Playing the part of Kevin, you have to guide the Passengers through some of the worst hazards encountered in modern games playing before the compartments become flooded and time runs out.Cheat: Level PasswordsAt the password screen, enter the following passwords to warp to the correspondant levelCheat: Final LevelAt the password screen, enter the following password to warp to the final level (level 100):
